Title: The New Industrialists | Cognite and unlocking industrial data value
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
The video features Jason Schern, Field CTO at Cognite, discussing how industrial companies can leverage AI and advanced data solutions to overcome challenges with diverse and siloed data, improve operational efficiency, and transform the role of industrial workers through automation and contextualized insights.

Visit the Manufacturing AI site: https://msft.it/6057tfvEl
